readability_reflection: I found string concatenation more readable. It simply feels more logical to use '+'. I also just am not too familiar with string interpolation.
comprehension_debugging: String concatenation was more familiar, so it was easier to understand or debug.
learning_curve: I was more familiar with string concatenation, so it was more recognizable and understandable.
suggestions_improvement: It is kind of hard to tell if there is a space between the quotations for string concatenation. Perhaps having some indicator.
